item.title: Fly tipping again, 26th September
item.description:
Please pick up all the rubbish that has been dumped in this area. Why have all the bins been taken away when the new bins have not been finished yet?! People are just leaving their garbage bags on the street and the foxes are making a mess! Please resolve ASAP or bring back our bins!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cantwell Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flag fixed on top of Elmers End area sign marker on roundabout, 26th September
item.description:
This flag has sadly been weaponised lately by groups with aggressive segregation politics and we do not want this displayed on public property in our neighbourhood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Virgin media bollards and hole cover flytipped, 26th September
item.description:
Virgin media bollards and hole cover flytipped, has been there for 8 weeks at least. Virgin media have been called but have done nothing to remove them. The hole cover is heavy and is now on one side, it's dangerous if it falls on a child, was also becoming a trip hazard. On corner of Heathwood Gardens and Woodland Terrace

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1a, Heathwood Gardens, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oil spill, 26th September
item.description:
There's a car oil spillage on the road outside my property that I noticed last night, it has been driven through and spread numerous times. The smell is very overpowering down the entire road, and it's a hazard for drivers to drive through and also for road conditions

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warner Road, Plaistow, London

item.title: Cherry Tree pruning, 26th September
item.description:
Please could you prune the cherry tree on the pavement in front of 17 Woodlea Drive which has low hanging branches and overhangs Woodlea Drive and no17 property which impacts pedestrians. It is also growing taller and the tree would benefit from the top of its canopy being reduced proportionately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Woodlea Drive, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Heath, Charlton, London

item.title: Bulk waste left outside the bin area, 26th September
item.description:
Bulk waste and broken unwanted furniture left outside the bin area , including a large piece of broken glass furniture which is very unsafe. The bin area is located opposite 88 Purbrook Estate. On the corner of Riley Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Purbrook Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive lime bikes outside our home, 26th September
item.description:
- far too many bikes parked outside our home - too noisy especially at night - bikes falling down all the time , waking us up - Lime bikes are ignoring this issue !!! Remove parking bay to more suitable location!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gore Road, Hackney, London
